content:
We have a huge milestone today!
The regularity of 1-sum and 2-sum has finally been finished.
:tada:

You can see a formally verified summary of the results here:
https://github.com/Ivan-Sergeyev/seymour/blob/main/Seymour.lean
FYI, I updated the summary of the results for something much better.
Martin Dvořák has marked this topic as resolved.
